verses.1: Mite in bangbang a geel zongin Topaʼ deihna bang bekin a piang ding hizaw hi.
verses.2: Mihingte pen a gamtatna uh ah man kisa a, ahi zongin Topa in a khenna khat na om hi.
verses.3: Na geelnate khempeuh Topa ap in; tua hileh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
verses.4: Topa in na khempeuh ngimna nei-in bawl a, migilote nangawn siatna a thuak dingin a bawl ahi hi.
verses.5: Topa in a kihisak mite mudah a, amaute in gimna thuak hamtang uh hi.
verses.6: Thumanna le cihtakna mawhmai ngahna hi a, Topa zahtakna siatna tawh kipelhna ahi hi.
verses.7: Topaʼ deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawm a kaih zawhna ahi hi.
verses.8: Thuman loin hauhna sangin thumanin tawmno neihna a hoih zaw ahi hi.
verses.9: Mihing in thu geel a, ahi zongin Topaʼ deihna bangin kisem khia hi.
verses.10: Kumpipa in thuman genin thu a khen ciangin khial ngei lo hi.
verses.11: A man tawikhaina le tawi tehnate Topa aʼ hi a, a tawisuang khempeuh ama bawl sa ahi hi.
verses.12: Thumanin gamtatna bek in kumpi kipsak ahih manin a sia-a gamtat ding kumpite ut lo uh hi.
verses.13: Kumpite in thuman genna deih uh a, thuman a gen mite it uh hi.
verses.14: Kumpipa heh leh mi khatpeuh in sih lawh thei a, mipil khat in kumpipa lungdamsak thei hi.
verses.15: Kumpipa maitai leh nuntakna hi a, ama pahtakna pen tuk hunin guah a zusak meiipi tawh kibang hi.
verses.16: Kham sangin pilna hoih zaw a, ngun sangin thutheihna deihhuai zaw hi.
verses.17: Mihoihte in siatna tawh a kipelh ding lampi tawn uh a, a lampi tot ding limtakin a ngaihsun mi in a nuntakna a hu ahi hi.
verses.18: Kisaktheihna in siatna hong tuaksak a, kiphatsakna in pukna hong piangsak hi.
verses.19: Mi kihisak tawh kipawlin vankisutte ngahna sangin mizawngte tawh kikhawlin mi neu a om hoih zaw hi.
verses.20: Thuhilhna a mang mite a maa vang dinga, Topa a muang mite a lung dam ding hi.
verses.21: Lungsim pilte thumuhna tawh kampau uh a, amauʼ kam khumna zaknophuai kisa semsem hi.
verses.22: Pilna pen mipilte adingin hinna tuinak bang hi a, mihaite ahihleh amauʼ haina mah in gimna thuaksak hi.
verses.23: Mipilte in thu ngaihsun kawmin kampau uh a, amauʼ pauna zaknophuai semsem hi.
verses.24: Kam khum pen khuaizu bang hi a, i kam ah khum a, i pumpi adingin zong hoih mahmah hi.
verses.25: Hoih hi, ci-in i ngaihsut thu khat pen sih theih nading thu na hi zawsop thei hi.
verses.26: An duhna in mi na semsak a, gilkialna in nak sepsak semsem zaw hi.
verses.27: Migilote in siat nading bek zongzong uh a, a kampaunate uh na a kaang tum thei meikuang tawh kibang hi.
verses.28: Mihoih lote in kitotna piangsak a, mi gensiate in lawmta ki-it kimlai kimudahsak hi.
verses.29: A ngongtat mite in a lawmte zol a, lungkhamna sung tunpih hi.
verses.30: A mit hong sitsante thusia a ngaihsun hi a, a neh hong piksante thusia geel ahi hi.
verses.31: A teekteʼ sam kang minthanna lukhu hi a, thumanin nuntakna tawh a ngah ahi hi.
verses.32: Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoih zaw a, khuapi khat uk zawhna sangin eimah ki-uk zawhna hoih zaw hi.
verses.33: Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen Topaʼ deihna bang bek hizaw hi.
